creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
Even if a BodyTag-tag used in a JSP does not have a body 
the doInitBody and doAfterBody methods are called. According to JSP 1.1, section 5.4.4, these should not be invoked if there is no body!

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
This some debate about the exact interpretation of the specification in this 
regard.  We are waiting for feedback from the specification team before 
adressing this.  It won't make it into Tomcat 3.2.2 but may be incorporated 
into a later release.
